game.name: FISHERY
game.genres: Casual, Indie, Simulation, Strategy, Early Access
game.categories: Single-player, Custom Volume Controls, Playable without Timed Input, Save Anytime, Stereo Sound, Surround Sound, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: 스타일리시한 수족관 시뮬레이션 게임 《Fishery》에서 창의력을 발휘해 아름다운 수중 서식지를 만들어 보세요. 그리고 물고기들이 그 집을 즐기는 모습을 감상해보세요.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Fishery is a stylized aquarium simulation game. Harness your creativity to build and maintain beautiful aquatic habitats. Then relax and watch your beautiful fish enjoy their home.

reviewHighlights.text: there is fish in this game i can confirm that
